passage_text: When I first heard Will Owen-Gage in 2005, he was so good it was scary. The guitar whiz was all of 17 years old. But be played his Stratocaster with the skill of 37 and the wisdom of 77.. With many musicians, you detect patterns, riffs, cliched licks they use over and over.

Will Owen-Gage ~ Blues in the Mornin' Date: Friday, November 21, 2003 @ 19:52:44 UTC Artist: Will Owen-Gage CD: Blues in the Mornin' Home: San Antonio, Texas Style: Texas/Chicago Blues Quote: Will has found his muse and his niche and seems to at least know where he is going..

Guitarist Will Owen-Gage, a 15-year-old virtuoso in the mold of the late Texas guitar hero Stevie Ray Vaughan, picked up a battered Ovation acoustic guitar and started playing the Jimi Hendrix blues Red House..

Prepare to be WOGged!!! Will Owen-Gage, blues guitar wizzard, gives his version of the classic blues tune, Little Red Rooster with the South Texas Destroyers at County Line BBQ. Video by Texas Outlaw Video. 1  Music. 2  Standard YouTube License.
Guitar-slinging prodigy Will Owen-Gage rides a great blues solo in a song that i failed to get completely on film and don't know now what it was.
